title: AE/PR插件-粗糙复古8bit比特像素效果 RetroDither v1.7 Win/Mac
author: 大众脸
content: RetroDither 是一款为 Adobe After Effects 设计的 GPU 加速插件，可模拟复古游戏主机和家用电脑平台的抖动（dithering）效果与色彩方案。该插件支持超过10种不同的有序抖动和误差扩散算法，并提供多种自适应及经典硬件色彩调色板，如 ZX Spectrum、CGA、MSX 等。适用于为动态图形或视频素材添加真实的复古风格。插件内置大量预设，支持在 AE 与 Premiere 中使用。
supported_versions: After Effects: CC 2019, CC 2018, CC 2017, CC 2015.3, CC 2015, CC 2014, CC, CS6, CS5.5, CS5; Premiere: CC 2019, CC 2018, CC 2017, CC 2015.3, CC 2015, CC 2014, CC, CS6, CS5.5, CS5

other.update_notes: v1.7 更新内容：- 框架更新；- 修复 Catalina 问题
other.description_en: RetroDither is a GPU accelerated plugin for Adobe After Effects which allows to create stylized images with dithering and color schemes from retro game consoles and home computer platforms. You could call it ‘save GIF for web’ on steroids on first sight, but in fact RetroDithering is capable to do so much more, having more than 10 different ordered and errordiffusion dithering algorithms and color palettes varying from several adaptive to classic hardware ones, such as ZX spectrum, CGA, MSX and many more. Now you can do very authentic stylizing, if you’re trying to add some retro feeling into your motion graphics or footage.
